Articles.Content:
(Feel free to move to OT, if needed)

After trying to put together multiple lets-plays, it started getting bland. To be honest, I'm not all that exciting because I instinctively take things seriously, and I don't try to make spectacular explosions all the time to keep the audience interested. Hours of LP material down the drain.

So, I would like to hold a small, and probably brief, discussion of a livestream and how it would work. Does anyone have experience? Tips? I just feel that it gives me direct connect to the audience, and their live questions and comments would put together a presentable show of sorts.

Thoughts?
livstreaming tip: LOOK AT THE CHAT, can't tell you how many people do not pay attention to the chat as much as they should.
I actually just got done streaming for a friend. I'm unpopular and have no friends though so I don't have an "audience" to entertain.

livstreaming tip: LOOK AT THE CHAT, can't tell you how many people do not pay attention to the chat as much as they should.

That's exactly why I want to do it. I don't particularly have the creativity to plan out my deaths and epic fails - it's much more fun to have that happen on it's own anyway.

Greetings !

I use FFSPLIT which is a freeware - it does have some glitchyness and a short to medium learning curve - but basically I now stream almost every nite and this is about the ony game I am on now; and trust me I have several hundreds of hours in MMORPG's and am very active online.

In fact I will be streming now very shortly:

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

There are also others who stream; check them out; some are entertaining; some I dunno; you decide - that's the beauty of it.

In fact I gleamed an idea last nite I need to dig into befreo I forget it...

Good Luck And Happy Streaming !

Cdr Zeta

Livestreaming makes the game more fun as others watch you fail live or suggest to you crazy new rocket ideas. Audiences get excited during those last seconds of landing and you're running low on fuel.

You may also want to check out Open Broadcaster (OBS) its free as well, Streaming can be a lot of fun, It requires a good PC and a decent connection.

Links:

http://obsproject.com/

Connection settings estimator!

http://obsproject.com/estimator

Edited April 21, 2013 by Nexustrimean
If you are too serious, maybe I can join you in your livestream via voice and brighten things up

Howdi !

Ya I an tending to get into the game - I play alot of flight simulator (FSX); well I used to before I found KSP.

I am now setting up my stream at:

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Working on space planes; design, build, test...need to do some rover design attach to the plane as well.

Cdr Zeta

Howdi Space Engineers !

Before I work on my rocket problems, I am jammin tonite !

Hop on over to the party at:

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

I may take requests !

I am havin a blast with KSP ! Sometimes tho I get brain freeze and need to unwind; this is how I unwind !

I will be jammin to available online videos, and I may try to stream a radio station and go totally adlib ! Watch it I may miss a few notes haha!

Cdr Zeta

Howdi,

Whew 4 hours of jammin guitar music last nite on my stream !

Well it's time to get the engineers out an crakkin...errr...not 'kraken'...

I have a lifter rockt roll problem to be solved...will it happen !? I solved it once, but the second time...I dunno yet...

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Hope to see yas !

Cdr Zeta
